txt.en: You must place a delving zircon into the fissure in the delving stone. This will unlock the potency trapped within the gemstone and unleash it upon the world.
The Zircon in the Delving Stone crumbles
'The enemy grew stronger? Well... that bodes ill. We should be cautious about freeing whatever evil is within these gems.\n\n'I promised you a reward and I shall not disappoint.'
Tier 01: Delving Zircon
If only you had a delving zircon you could affix to the stone.
Affix the delving zircon into the delving stone
Without a delving zircon you cannot unlock the greater strength of the enemies in this space.
If you leave the mission you will fail the Delving
The stone is inert. There is a clear fissure in the surface where one, with a little effort, could affix a gem of some sort. Perhaps you have such a gem in your possession.
Complete the current mission and find the scout
Affix the delving zircon to the delving stone ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Failure: Leave the instance
A malice spread from within the gemstone you affixed to the delving stone. You must defeat the enemies and complete the mission to rid the evil from the world.
Acquire a delving zircon ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Complete the current mission and find the scout
You left the instance and failed
Delving deeply into the world, the forces of the enemy are more powerful and vicious.

A fissure in the delving stone looks as though a small gem could fit within. Perhaps if you had a delving gem of some kind it would fit easily into this standing stone.\n\nIf you have a delving zircon it will fit this stone.
You place the delving zircon into the fissure in the delving stone
Having completed the mission with the malice affecting the denizens within, you should now make your way back to the mission giver and tell them of your success.
The delving zircon looks as though it could fit seamlessly into the stone.
Having completed the mission, you should return to the delving stone.
Affix the zircon into the delving stone
A malice spreads through the area...
Affix the delving zircon into the delving stone
Affix a delving zircon to the delving stone - DNT
A malice spreads through the area
Complete the current mission
A malice spreads through the area released from within the delving zircon. Enemies are stronger now. With this new risk comes the promise of reward.
Affix the zircon into the delving stone
I should have de-spawned
Return to and interact with the Delving Stone
Complete the current mission
Speak with the mission giver
Failure: Leave the instance
The delving stone appears to have a fissure into which you can place a delving gem.

The Delving Zircon fits into the fissure within the Delving stone. The zircon cracks and the darkness within creeps out of the stone and moves into the air as a black tendril. A flash of dread fills you but passes.
You failed the Delving

\qThe enemy grew stronger? That is fell news. We should approach using these with great care. I did promise you a reward, [placeholder]. Here it is, something that you might find useful. We have quite a collection we are building thanks to folk like you.\q
You left the instance and failed the delving

The delving zircon fits into the fissure within the delving stone. The zircon cracks and the darkness within creeps out of the stone and moves into the air as a black tendril. A flash of dread fills you but passes.
A malice spreads through the area...
